alert.note: Alert for Clay; Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 9:59AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Mississippi, southeastern Clay, Pemiscot, eastern Dunklin, western Dyer, northwestern Lauderdale and western Lake Counties through 1045 AM CDT... At 958 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Holcomb to 7 miles west of Steele to near Osceola. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blytheville, Kennett, Osceola, Caruthersville, Piggott, Gosnell, Hayti, Steele, Campbell, Luxora, Tiptonville, Malden, Ridgely, Hornersville, Holcomb, Hayti Heights, Cooter, Wardell, St. Francis and Dell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
